Bollettino.Note: Where do you find the notice number?

Dialog.Avviso: Do you want to add this charge to the cart with these data just entered?

Form.Titolo: Data necessary for the delivery of the receipt
Form.Note: We ask you for this data because...

Dialog.Avviso: Do you want to add this charge to the cart with these data just entered?

Dettaglio.Eseguito: The payment required appears to have been successful. The payment receipt will be sent to the address provided.
Dettaglio.Fallito: The payment required does NOT appear to have been successful.

InCorso.Ok: The payment process has been completed successfully. We are awaiting confirmation of payment from the pagoPA platform.
InCorso.Errore: The payment process has been completed without the payment of the due amount. We are awaiting confirmation of payment from the pagoPA platform.

Timeout.Ok: The payment process has been completed successfully, but there has been a delay in communicating the payment claim from the pagoPA platform. As soon as it is made available, we will send it to your email address.
Timeout.Errore: The payment process was completed without the payment of the due, but there was a delay in the communication of the payment attestation from the pagoPA platform. As soon as it is made available, we will send it to your email address.

Overflow.Ok: The payment process has been completed successfully. Still trying to communicate the payment claim from the pagoPA platform. As soon as it is made available, we will send it to your email address.
Overflow.Errore: The payment process was completed without the payment of the due. The communication of the payment attestation from the pagoPA platform is not yet available. We will take care of delivering it to your email address.

JsonForm.MinLength: Must be {{minimumLength}} characters or longer (current length: {{currentLength}})
JsonForm.MaxLength: Must be {{maximumLength}} characters or shorter (current length: {{currentLength}})

Format.Ipv6: Must be an IPv6 address, like 1234:5678:9ABC:DEF0:1234:5678:9ABC:DEF0
Format.Url: Must be a url, like http://www.example.com/page.html
Format.Color: Must be a color, like #FFFFFF or rgb(255, 255, 255)
Format.JsonPointer: Must be a JSON Pointer, like /pointer/to/something
Format.RelativeJsonPointer: Must be a relative JSON Pointer, like 2/pointer/to/something
Format.Regex: Must be a regular expression, like (1-)?\d{3}-\d{3}-\d{4}

JsonForm.Decimals: Must have {{decimals}} or fewer decimal places
JsonForm.MinProperties: Must have {{minimumProperties}} or more items (current items: {{currentProperties}})
JsonForm.MaxProperties: Must have {{maximumProperties}} or fewer items (current items: {{currentProperties}}
JsonForm.MinItems: Must have {{minimumItems}} or more items (current items: {{currentItems}})
JsonForm.MaxItems: Must have {{maximumItems}} or fewer items (current items: {{currentItems}})
